name: Jyothi-kondal
content: jyothi belong to third generation . Her husband name is kondal and they have 2 children(mahi and sai)

name: Nagesh-phuspa
content: Nagesh belong to third generation . His wife name is phuspa and they have 2 children(Kanna and snigdha)

name: Shailaja-bhaskar
content: Shailaja belong to third generation . Her husband name is bhaskar and they have 2 children(akshaya and praveen)

name: Prashanthi-Prashanth
content: prashanthi belong to third generation.Her husband name is prasthanth and they have 2 children(vimudha and vihas)

name: Ashok-shilpa
content: Ashok belong to third generation.His wife name is shilpa and they have 2 chidren(nirvika and nithvik)

name: Krishna-roja
content: krishna belong to third generation .His wife  is roja and they have 2 children(jayavath and riya)

name: Ramesh-sravya
content: ramesh reddy belong to third generation .His wife name is sravya and they have 1 child (tetu)

name: Sandeep
content: sandeep reddy belong to third generation

name: Pavan
content: pavan kumar reddy belong to third generation
